description: Preston sign Watford defender Ryan Porteous on loan until the end of the season.
title: Ryan Porteous: Preston North End sign Watford defender on loan
title_page: Ryan Porteous: Preston North End sign Watford defender on loan - BBC Sport
maintext:
Preston have signed defender Ryan Porteous on loan until the end of the season from Championship rivals Watford.
The 25-year-old had made 25 appearances in all competitions for the Hornets this campaign.
The Scotland international started his career with Hibernian, where he worked with North End boss Paul Heckingbottom, before joining Watford in January 2023.
